title: The Department of Homeland Security is moving quietly, and it's launching loads of 'illicit strangers' away from the border.
subtitle: There is a disturbing article about what the United States is allegedly doing with people appearing on its southern border that is little like the facts.
author: Brooke Binkowski
vclaim: The Department of Homeland Security is secretly moving and releasing a crowd of undocumented people to the United States.
